Breeding adult.description: Neotropic Cormorants have a shorter neck and tail than Anhingas and they do not have silvery wing patches like Anhingas. They also do not swim with their body under the water like Anhingas.

Double-crested Cormorants have a shorter neck and tail than Anhingas. They are dark overall, lacking the silvery streaks and wing patches that Anhingas have. In flight cormorants look chunkier than the slender Anhinga.
